description:
Son of Hyoue Kazamaki, leader of the Fuuga Clan, which served the Kannagi for the last 300 years. In an elaborate plot to release the Fuuga Clan`s ancient master and take revenge on the Kannagi for the humiliation received since then, Ryuuya`s body becomes the host for a powerful yoma. Later on, he is killed in a joint attack by Kazuma and Ayano.
Source: wiki
name: Kazamaki Ryuuya
